PROMPTSETXUI.XUIEDITOR:
<dialog height="506" icon="PRPT" id="PRPTS" left="279" top="4" width="420"><readpanel fill="b" id="PRPTBOX" nl="1" scroll="v" text="Parameters"><properties><entry name="text">Parameters</entry><entry name="modifiable">0</entry></properties><text enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_PKG_NAMEs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" nl="1" regex="" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Package name" tooltip="pkgadd transfers the contents of a software package from the distribution medium or directory to install it onto the system. The parameter can have the following values: <package> ...: one or more packages separated by spaces. Example: SUNWj5rt SUNWj5jmp SUNWj5dev all: instead of supplying package names to install, you can use the keyword all. In this case all packages found in the package source are installed." upper="0" required="0" alt="1" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_STRING</entry><entry name="text">Package name</entry><entry name="multiselect">0</entry><entry name="separator">;</entry><entry name="len"/><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_PKG_NAMEs.00</entry><entry name="inputassistance">0</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="upper">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="showaspassword">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">pkgadd transfers the contents of a software package from the distribution medium or directory to install it onto the system. The parameter can have the following values:
<package> ...: one or more packages separated by spaces. Example: SUNWj5rt SUNWj5jmp SUNWj5dev
all: instead of supplying package names to install, you can use the keyword all. In this case all packages found in the package source are installed.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="regex"/><entry name="required">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="multiline">0</entry><entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry><entry name="onchangereset"/><entry name="resetable">1</entry></properties></text><text enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_PKG_SRCs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Package source" tooltip="Specifies the installation source of the packages. Possible values: <directory>: a directory containing packages as subdirectories <filename>: a datastream (PKG file) created by pkgtrans <http(s)://myurl>: a HTTP(S) URL pointing to a datastream If no value is given, the default spool directory (/var/spool/pkg) is used. On the command line the option "-d" is used, if the parameter is not empty." upper="0" alt="1" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_STRING</entry><entry name="text">Package source</entry><entry name="multiselect">0</entry><entry name="separator">;</entry><entry name="len"/><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_PKG_SRCs.00</entry><entry name="inputassistance">0</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="upper">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="showaspassword">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Specifies the installation source of the packages. Possible values:
<directory>: a directory containing packages as subdirectories
<filename>: a datastream (PKG file) created by pkgtrans
<http(s)://myurl>: a HTTP(S) URL pointing to a datastream
If no value is given, the default spool directory (/var/spool/pkg) is used.
On the command line the option "-d" is used, if the parameter is not empty.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="regex"/><entry name="required">0</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="multiline">0</entry><entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry><entry name="onchangereset"/><entry name="resetable">1</entry></properties></text><dynradiogroup enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_PKG_FAIL_IF_INSTALLEDs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Fail if installed" tooltip="If set to 'yes', the runbook function fails if all packages with the same version to be installed are already installed." alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry><entry name="text">Fail if installed</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_PKG_FAIL_IF_INSTALLEDs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">If set to 'yes', the runbook function fails if all packages with the same version to be installed are already installed.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/></properties></dynradiogroup><text enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_ADMIN_FILEs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Admin file" tooltip="Define an installation administration file, admin, to be used in place of the default administration file. Unless a full path name is given, pkgadd first looks in the current working directory for the administration file. If the specified administration file is not in the current working directory, pkgadd looks in the /var/sadm/install/admin directory for the administration file. On the command line the option "-a" is used if the parameter is not empty." upper="0" alt="1" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_STRING</entry><entry name="text">Admin file</entry><entry name="multiselect">0</entry><entry name="separator">;</entry><entry name="len"/><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_ADMIN_FILEs.00</entry><entry name="inputassistance">0</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="upper">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="showaspassword">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Define an installation administration file, admin, to be used in place of the default administration file. Unless a full path name is given, pkgadd first looks in the current working directory for the administration file. If the specified administration file is not in the current working directory, pkgadd looks in the /var/sadm/install/admin directory for the administration file.
On the command line the option "-a" is used if the parameter is not empty.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="regex"/><entry name="required">0</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="multiline">0</entry><entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry><entry name="onchangereset"/><entry name="resetable">1</entry></properties></text><text enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_RESPONSE_FILEs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Response file" tooltip="Identify a file or directory which contains output from a previous pkgask session. This file supplies the interaction responses that would be requested by the package in interactive mode. response must be a full pathname. On the command line the option "-r" is used if the parameter is not empty." upper="0" alt="1" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_STRING</entry><entry name="text">Response file</entry><entry name="multiselect">0</entry><entry name="separator">;</entry><entry name="len"/><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_RESPONSE_FILEs.00</entry><entry name="inputassistance">0</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="upper">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="showaspassword">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Identify a file or directory which contains output from a previous pkgask session. This file supplies the interaction responses that would be requested by the package in interactive mode. response must be a full pathname. On the command line the option "-r" is used if the parameter is not empty.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="regex"/><entry name="required">0</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="multiline">0</entry><entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry><entry name="onchangereset"/><entry name="resetable">1</entry></properties></text><dynradiogroup enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_GLOBAL_ZONEs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Global zone" tooltip="Add package(s) in the current zone only. When used in the global zone, the package is added to the global zone only and is not propagated to any existing or yet-to-be-created non-global zone. When used in a non-global zone, the package(s) are added to the non-global zone only. This option causes package installation to fail if, in the pkginfo file for a package, SUNW_PKG_ALLZONES is set to true. See pkginfo. Add package(s) in the current zone only. When used in the global zone, the package is added to the global zone only and is not propagated to any existing or yet-to-be-created non-global zone. When used in a non-global zone, the package(s) are added to the non-global zone only. This option causes package installation to fail if, in the pkginfo file for a package, SUNW_PKG_ALLZONES is set to true. See pkginfo. On the command line the option "-G" is used, if the parameter set to yes." alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry><entry name="text">Global zone</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_GLOBAL_ZONEs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Add package(s) in the current zone only. When used in the global zone, the package is added to the global zone only and is not propagated to any existing or yet-to-be-created non-global zone. When used in a non-global zone, the package(s) are added to the non-global zone only. This option causes package installation to fail if, in the pkginfo file for a package, SUNW_PKG_ALLZONES is set to true. See pkginfo.
Add package(s) in the current zone only. When used in the global zone, the package is added to the global zone only and is not propagated to any existing or yet-to-be-created non-global zone. When used in a non-global zone, the package(s) are added to the non-global zone only. This option causes package installation to fail if, in the pkginfo file for a package, SUNW_PKG_ALLZONES is set to true. See pkginfo.
On the command line the option "-G" is used, if the parameter set to yes.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/></properties></dynradiogroup><text enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_ROOT_PATHs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Root path" tooltip="Define the full path name of a directory to use as the root_path. All files, including package system information files, are relocated to a directory tree starting in the specified root_path. The root_path may be specified when installing to a client from a server (for example, /export/root/client1). The root file system of any non-global zones must not be referenced with the -R option. Doing so might damage the global zone's file system, might compromise the security of the global zone, and might damage the non-global zone's file system. On the command line the option "-R" is used, if the parameter is not empty. " upper="0" alt="1" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_STRING</entry><entry name="text">Root path</entry><entry name="multiselect">0</entry><entry name="separator">;</entry><entry name="len"/><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_ROOT_PATHs.00</entry><entry name="inputassistance">0</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="upper">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="showaspassword">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Define the full path name of a directory to use as the root_path. All files, including package system information files, are relocated to a directory tree starting in the specified root_path. The root_path may be specified when installing to a client from a server (for example, /export/root/client1). The root file system of any non-global zones must not be referenced with the -R option. Doing so might damage the global zone's file system, might compromise the security of the global zone, and might damage the non-global zone's file system.
On the command line the option "-R" is used, if the parameter is not empty. </entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="regex"/><entry name="required">0</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="multiline">0</entry><entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry><entry name="onchangereset"/><entry name="resetable">1</entry></properties></text><text enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_WRITE_SPOOL_DIRs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Write to spool only" tooltip="Write the package into the directory &UC4RB_WRITE_SPOOL_DIR# instead of installing it. On the command line the option "-s" is used, if the parameter is not empty." upper="0" alt="1" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_STRING</entry><entry name="text">Write to spool only</entry><entry name="multiselect">0</entry><entry name="separator">;</entry><entry name="len"/><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_WRITE_SPOOL_DIRs.00</entry><entry name="inputassistance">0</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="upper">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="showaspassword">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Write the package into the directory &UC4RB_WRITE_SPOOL_DIR# instead of installing it.
On the command line the option "-s" is used, if the parameter is not empty.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="regex"/><entry name="required">0</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="multiline">0</entry><entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry><entry name="onchangereset"/><entry name="resetable">1</entry></properties></text><dynradiogroup enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_VERBOSEs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Verbose" tooltip="Trace all of the scripts that get executed by pkgadd, located in the pkginst/install directory. This option is used for debugging the procedural and non-procedural scripts. On the command line the option "-v" is used, if the parameter set to yes." alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry><entry name="text">Verbose</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_VERBOSEs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Trace all of the scripts that get executed by pkgadd, located in the pkginst/install directory. This option is used for debugging the procedural and non-procedural scripts.
On the command line the option "-v" is used, if the parameter set to yes.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/></properties></dynradiogroup><text enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_RPM_HTTP_PROXYs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="HTTP proxy" tooltip="Specify a HTTP[S] proxy to use when downloading packages. The format of proxy is host:port, where host is the hostname of the HTTP[S] proxy, and port is the port number associated with the proxy. This switch overrides all other methods of specifying a proxy. See ENVIRONMENT VARIABLES for more information on alternate methods of specifying a default proxy. On the command line the option "-x" is used, if the parameter is not empty." upper="0" alt="1" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_STRING</entry><entry name="text">HTTP proxy</entry><entry name="multiselect">0</entry><entry name="separator">;</entry><entry name="len"/><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_RPM_HTTP_PROXYs.00</entry><entry name="inputassistance">0</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="upper">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="showaspassword">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Specify a HTTP[S] proxy to use when downloading packages. The format of proxy is host:port, where host is the hostname of the HTTP[S] proxy, and port is the port number associated with the proxy. This switch overrides all other methods of specifying a proxy. See ENVIRONMENT VARIABLES for more information on alternate methods of specifying a default proxy.
On the command line the option "-x" is used, if the parameter is not empty.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="regex"/><entry name="required">0</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="multiline">0</entry><entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry><entry name="onchangereset"/><entry name="resetable">1</entry></properties></text><text enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_SUDO_PASSWORDs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="1" text="Sudo password" tooltip="Sudo password." upper="0" alt="1" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_STRING</entry><entry name="text">Sudo password</entry><entry name="multiselect">0</entry><entry name="separator">;</entry><entry name="len"/><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_SUDO_PASSWORDs.00</entry><entry name="inputassistance">0</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="upper">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="showaspassword">1</entry><entry name="tooltip">Sudo password.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="regex"/><entry name="required">0</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="multiline">0</entry><entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry><entry name="onchangereset"/><entry name="resetable">1</entry></properties></text></readpanel></dialog>

PROMPTSETDATA.DATAEDITOR: <PRPTS ontop="1"><PRPTBOX><UC4RB_PKG_NAMEs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_PKG_NAME#" ReadFromTable="OPSE"></UC4RB_PKG_NAMEs.00><UC4RB_PKG_SRCs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_PKG_SRC#" ReadFromTable="OPSE"></UC4RB_PKG_SRCs.00><UC4RB_PKG_FAIL_IF_INSTALLEDs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_PKG_FAIL_IF_INSTALLED#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">NO</UC4RB_PKG_FAIL_IF_INSTALLEDs.00><UC4RB_ADMIN_FILEs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_ADMIN_FILE#" ReadFromTable="OPSE"></UC4RB_ADMIN_FILEs.00><UC4RB_RESPONSE_FILEs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_RESPONSE_FILE#" ReadFromTable="OPSE"></UC4RB_RESPONSE_FILEs.00><UC4RB_GLOBAL_ZONEs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_GLOBAL_ZONE#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">NO</UC4RB_GLOBAL_ZONEs.00><UC4RB_ROOT_PATHs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_ROOT_PATH#" ReadFromTable="OPSE"></UC4RB_ROOT_PATHs.00><UC4RB_WRITE_SPOOL_DIRs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_WRITE_SPOOL_DIR#" ReadFromTable="OPSE"></UC4RB_WRITE_SPOOL_DIRs.00><UC4RB_VERBOSEs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_VERBOSE#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">NO</UC4RB_VERBOSEs.00><UC4RB_RPM_HTTP_PROXYs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_RPM_HTTP_PROXY#" ReadFromTable="OPSE"></UC4RB_RPM_HTTP_PROXYs.00><UC4RB_SUDO_PASSWORDs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SUDO_PASSWORD#" ReadFromTable="OPSE"></UC4RB_SUDO_PASSWORDs.00></PRPTBOX></PRPTS>
